import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export function Home() { return ( <>

A global collective of existing local boutique Event Management partner companies in over 700 locations worldwide, serving new national and
international client’s requirements.

Business & Personal Global Concierge Services

Spice Global Management is only a concept idea for the moment, and it is the creation of Barry Murphy from Ireland who is a lifelong serial successful entrepreneur. (See the about page )

If we can find enough quality boutique professional event management companies who would like to partner with us locally in over 700 locations worldwide, we will create the website and APP fully.

The concept was designed because Barry was trying to find different quality service providers in multiple locations worldwide simultaneously, and he realised how time consuming and difficult it is.

Then he was thinking about how many other companies or entrepreneurs have the same issue, and why not create a solution to the problem.

What if we created a collective of quality event management service provider partners under one brand name, who would also still operate their own business independently?

Now, a corporation, company or entrepreneur could execute the same task in multiple locations worldwide simultaneously, while only dealing with one person directly in the headquarters team, who would pass on the task/s to our partners in all locations.

Then the following questions arose in Barry’s head:

Who would be our ideal service provider partners in any location?

Small intimate Event Management companies with a good track record who speak fluent English, or an experienced individual who would like to create their own new local event management company to partner with Spice Global Management.

Companies who are also willing to offer other services to what they are used to offering with the help of local trustworthy external suppliers who they are happy to work with. Example of Accountancy, Recruitment, Legal etc.

(Basically, partners build up their own local network of quality service providers across different categories)

Who is our ideal client demographic?

Perhaps some of the following:

Someone who wanted to test a product or service across multiple locations simultaneously.

Someone who wanted to create a global launch of a product or service.

Someone who wants to recruit a global team instantly for whatever purpose.

Someone who wants to create hype around a new music album maybe.

Someone who wants to conduct global market research on some topic or product.

Our clients will be big multinational corporations, small companies, startups, individuals or government departments.

What is our Unique Selling Point?

A well organised and reliable boutique global network of local quality, affordable event management service providers, who can handle many tasks simultaneously in every corner of the world on behalf of national and international clients.

What Services exactly will we offer clients?

All Event Management Services, whether product or service launch, Team building events, PR related services, Tourist events, Personal events ETC.
Marketing Management to include social media marketing, digital marketing, content creation, market research, temporary local sales representatives and anything else that makes sense!
Recruitment Services to provide local professionals to global clients online or offline.

(Our Event Management Partners will select which of these services they will handle inhouse, and which they will use external local quality providers for)

Promoting and offering global franchise opportunities to locals from global clients, just like this franchise.
All professional services to assist companies setup a base in multiple locations worldwide, such as:
Accountancy
Legal
IT
Engineering
ETC
Concierge Services:
Relocation Assistance Tour Guides
Accomodation
Airport Transfers
Translations
ETC.

How will we all make money from our boutique global network?

Local Event Management Partners will charge our clients 10% more than what they would normally charge for such services, whether they are handling client tasks inhouse or outsourcing, but their normal charges must be reasonable in the first place, so that we are still providing clients with very good value, and to ensure they become repetitive customers on an ongoing basis.

Spice Event Management will charge our global clients a 5% management fee for managing their global task executions, plus we will charge our local event management partners a 200 Euro monthly licensing fee, which will cover our global marketing strategy costs to attract national and international clients in the first place. (The monthly licence fee will be substantially reduced in underprivileged locations, and in some cases may even be zero)

How will we all make money from our boutique global network?

Do you believe you can connect with reliable, quality, and affordable
external local service providers to execute tasks that you are not equipped too?

Are you sure you want to take your company in this expansion direction,
or perhaps you are happy to continue working as you are now?

Do you understand the future potential extra spin off benefits to joining our team, besides the ones mentioned above?

Are you willing to turn the earth upside down to make sure a client
task is delivered on time and properly, even when something goes wrong.

(No excuses, the client doesn’t care, unless he/she reads about an earthquake in the news)

Do you have a plan B in place in case of a personal emergency?

Maybe you don’t want that pressure in your life?

Maybe you do?

Apply to join us for your location, and let’s see what happens from there.

); } export default Home;
